title: Smart Money sans serif
content: Does anyone know the name of the sans serif typeface used in Smart Money magazine?
author: Chris Kozlowski

comments.content: I havenâ€™t seen the magazine, but the sans used in their [media kit](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094354/http:/www.smartmoney.com/mag/mediakit/pdf/E1.pdf) is [Akzidenz Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094354/http:/www.philsfonts.com/showing.html?sku=AB890010X1P1&start=1). Alternatively, you could try [Basic Commercial](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094354/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/basic-commercial-lt/?refby=typographica).
